PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-02812017-03-24,  ,  PS,  , 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 206, Alberta
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 206 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the provision of financial assistance to the province of ALBERTA, to implement measures to address overdoses and deaths related to fentanyl and other opioids.
AttachmentsAttachment
